scenario_name: Normal Order Fulfillment in Semiconductor Manufacturing
description: An AI agent manages the fulfillment of a large semiconductor wafer order. This involves coordinating multiple internal and external resources to ensure timely and cost-effective delivery.  The scenario focuses on the normal, expected workflow of such a process.
initial_goal: Fulfill order #12345 for 1000 x 300mm silicon wafers with specifications X, Y, Z by 2024-03-15.
